channel.title: Gregorian calendar useing?
channel.description: Hello moparscaper's I want to understand gregorian calendar. SO example i want to make if player use's donator ticket (i made item name donator ticket if u activate it it donates) it keeps him donator 45 days and after 45 days it make's normal player anyone please help..

item.title: Gregorian calendar useing?
item.dc:creator: @570fd 570fd
item.description:
@570fd wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:5, topic:376868”]Well, that’s easy.

Just save the date the player got made a donator to his profile, and the date which it will expire. Everytime the player have it check the two dates to see if they match, if they do match, remove the donator status.

You can read up on the Gregorian calendar here:

http://download.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/java/util/GregorianCalendar.html[/quote]

Thanks… rep for trying to help but not rlly understanded…
Now im lost searching new good 317 base…

Read full topic

item.title: Gregorian calendar useing?
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Well, that’s easy.

Just save the date the player got made a donator to his profile, and the date which it will expire. Everytime the player logs in have it check the two dates to see if they match, if they do match, remove the donator status.

You can read up on the Gregorian calendar here:

http://download.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/java/util/GregorianCalendar.html

Read full topic
